def main():
    r, D, x_2000 = map(int, input().split())
    for i in range(1, 11):
        print(r * x_2000 - D * i)
        x_2000 = r * x_2000 - D * i

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# input
r, D, x2000 = map(int, input().split())

def main():
    r, d, x_2000 = map(int, input().split())
    for i in range(1, 11):
        print(r * x_2000 - d)
        x_2000 = r * x_2000 - d

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
# A - Biscuits
# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc085/tasks/abc085_a

# Solved

# input & output
print('2018/01/', input()[-2:], sep='')


def main():
    r, D, x_2000 = map(int, input().split())
    for i in range(1, 11):
        print(r * x_2000 - D, end='\n')
        x_2000 = r * x_2000 - D

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
